author: towelcodes
description: Track and monitor user time spent in voice channels. Automatically monitors specified voice channels and provides leaderboards showing who has spent the most time in voice chat.
install_msg: VcTimer has been installed! Use `!add_monitor <voice_channel>` to start monitoring voice channels, then use `!vc_longest_time` to see the leaderboard.
short: Track user voice channel time and display leaderboards.
